mdRecord.dcterms:title: U.S. Army Medical Department cup and saucer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Greenwood Pottery Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The following text is printed on the cup with a caduceus: "U.S. Army Medical Department". The following text is stamped on the booton of the saucer: "1862 GREENWOOD CHINA TRENTON, N.J. 1876 REG U.S. PAT. OFF.".
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States. Army Medical Department
Drinking cups
